    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handleResign​()
      Handles resigns, if white or black declare "resign" Declare the other player the winner.
      boolean isCheck​(Location[][] board)
      isCheck gets called during the end of each move to see if the player's king is in check.
      void moveIterator​(Location[][] board)
      moveIterator is a helper method that make sure Pawns can only take en Passant if they are taking a piece that double pushed past the previous turn.
      void playGame​()
      Takes and parses input from a player.

    • Method Detail

      • moveIterator

        public void moveIterator​(Location[][] board)
        moveIterator is a helper method that make sure Pawns can only take en Passant if they are taking a piece that double pushed past the previous turn.
        Parameters:
        board - the game board that is being looked through

      • isCheck

        public boolean isCheck​(Location[][] board)
        isCheck gets called during the end of each move to see if the player's king is in check.
        Parameters:
        board - This parameter is the board that will be updated.
        Returns:
        return true if a player is in check, false if not.

      • playGame

        public void playGame​()
        Takes and parses input from a player. Current player make a move Then calls method to check if move is valid. That method take care of the movements. If its invalid, then user is prompted again.

      • handleResign

        public void handleResign​()
        Handles resigns, if white or black declare "resign" Declare the other player the winner.
